kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysession, url=http://api.geonames.org, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Get Value From Json
kw.doc: Get Value From JSON using JSONPath
kw.msg: @{alternateNames} = [ [{'name': 'Atacama Desert', 'lang': 'en'}, {'name': 'Atacoma Desert'}, {'isShortName': True, 'isPreferredName': True, 'name': "Désert d'Atacama", 'lang': 'fr'}, {'name': 'Desert of Atacama'}, {'name...

kw.name: Get From List
kw.doc: Returns the value specified with an ``index`` from ``list``.
kw.msg: ${firstAlternateName} = [{'name': 'Atacama Desert', 'lang': 'en'}, {'name': 'Atacoma Desert'}, {'isShortName': True, 'isPreferredName': True, 'name': "Désert d'Atacama", 'lang': 'fr'}, {'name': 'Desert of Atacama'}, {'name':...

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.
